website_summaries.verdict: This affordable mobile TV gives pricier competitors a run for their money with all the standard features plus an adjustable viewing angle.
pros: Robust steel frame accommodates up to 110 lbs
Optional bi-directional 15-degree tilt allows users to customize viewing angle
Large metal storage shelf boasts a generous weight capacity and holds more than most others
Fits VESA patterns up to 600 x 400mm
cons: Assembly can be a bit of a chore
Angle adjustment can be tricky for those with larger hands

customer_reviews.title: Pleased. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this stand. It was easy to assemble and is easily adjustable. I have it set to about the lowest height because I have a floor chair. When I want to watch TV in bed, I roll it to the foot of my bed and raise the height of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: With the layout of our studio apartment I had no idea how to create the home theatre experience with a 50" HDTV for my cinephile partner. After looking at the tremendously expensive easel solutions at another retailer I decided to try my luck seeing what Amazon had.... This is exactly what we needed! Anyone that has assembled a few pieces from ikea can have this up and running in about a half an hour. The quality is excellent for the price. Heavy steel pipe construction and everything but a Phillips head screwdriver comes in the box to assemble. Shipping was spot on with a two day free shipping arrival from Amazon prime. Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Reynald

customer_reviews.title: Threading will bite you. (Literally)
customer_reviews.text: While the stand appears to be built well enough to support to the weight of the display, I am one of the unlucky ones who got badly machined parts. The pipe connector has such sharp threading, it can literally draw blood. One of the main support bars will simply not thread to the pipe connector. This renders the stand effectively useless. Not sure if the company has quality controls in place, but if they do, this makes me doubt its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonwolf

customer_reviews.title: QA Nightmare - save your time!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design, worse machining. I pulled a loose thread off an aluminum piece. The threads felt so rough and gritty to begin with I was already raising an eyebrow. Sure enough, it won’t thread into the pipe. 45 minutes later, I learned this company is shipping useless parts. UNACCEPTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Stand for My Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: This stand is so fancy to me! I mean it's so useful for so many things and it is perfect if you live in a mobile home like me and can't mount anything on your walls. So I bought this to use in the corner of my home gym room and it's just so fancy looking I love it!!!! And I bought the TV from Amazon too and it's super fancy and cheap as well! Oh and the stand comes with the brackets for the TV and I have a 32" on mines!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, wish it had a larger shelf, or additional shelves available for purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and convenient way to mount a television. We have a 55" Visio TV mounted and it is sturdy and easy to move around. Like the locking wheels and the cable management. Wish it had a larger shelf, or accessory shelves available for after-market purchase. The little shelf is a great addition, but it is about 3" too small to fit our blue-ray entertainment system and the associated speakers. Would be great if we could purchase an additional shelf (or two) to add to the vertical support poles.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works well for mobility in 1 room, not perfect but recc
customer_reviews.text: Mobile cart and it works well with my 55” tv....The shelf is also a lot more sturdier than you would think. Not sure it’s as mobile as I would of liked as it is more of a chore to take tv off than necessary, could be easier with a release lever or something. Base at the front is very wide, assume for stability, wish it was a little smaller base in the front as it looks a little clunky. Otherwise works as expected and you can buy a 2nd shelf if needed. I had a PS4 and a sound bar on the shelf and it worked ok.
customer_reviews.author: NEfanman

customer_reviews.title: If you need to move this cart frequently, do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to move this cart around a lot this is not the cart for you. This is the second time we have purchased this cart and the swing time the same thing happened. We Purchased this cart to move our tv around our workspaces. The wheels are not bolted in. The wheels are actually screwed into the leg with only about 1/16 of threading. When the treading breaks the wheel will no longer stay attached to the cart. We will not make the same mistake for the third time and purchase this cart again!
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Wow this thing is great. Very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is great. Very adjustable, glides easily across the floor or even thin pile shag carpet. It was a bit time consuming to put together (many fasteners) but that is why the thing is so sturdy. A year ago i lost an $800 Screen when it got knocked off a table. If you put this together right, it is strong and is currently more than stable holding a 55" smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Garner

customer_reviews.title: Stout, stable, highly mobile for plug and play anywhere in a large room.
customer_reviews.text: The mobile TV cart assembly takes patience and attention to detail. All the parts were there. Several important ones are very tiny but critical to achieving stability. Price is excellent. We had no where near the problems assembling this equipment as did other reviewers. Take your time and be very precise and gentle when assembling the larger parts like the tubes. The threads are very sensitive (soft metal) and when stripped your assembly will be toast. Once assembled properly you can expect long term joy.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Attkisson

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect TV cart for what we were looking for. It took my husband about an hour and a half to put it together. Didnt have any issues with the set up. We are using it for our 32 inch set that is in our closed in patio. Before getting this, we had the TV sitting on pass-thru ledge from the kitchen which was not a good spot at all. Now it sits in the corner perfectly. We also like the tilt feature and also that the cables fit neatly inside the posts. I had been looking for one for awhile and this one fit the bill. Great price also. Thank you VIVO.....
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: it probably took me like 2 hours off and on through the course of ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have it a 4 stars is because the directions are not very clear when putting it together.. I wished the were more details with their diagrams.. Because it takes some patience to out it together.. it probably took me like 2 hours off and on through the course of several days lol I would get frustrated and then get away from the project until I coolled off.. The materials at super duper sturdy that's for sure.. I have a bit hesitant before ordering because I just want my t.v. to tip over since its an older unit and a bit on the heavy side..But it's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Yessy

customer_reviews.title: Well  worth  the price
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied by this purchase. Assembly could be much easier if they created a step-by-step video of placing different nuts and bolts in a greater detail, rather than creating an artwork video. First thing that buyers should know: There are two sets of nuts and bolts. black color and steel color. Put aside the steel color package. You are not going to need it until the end of assembly (I did not need it). Instruction is too minimal and small print, and to me was of very little help. I installed a 55" tv by myself; i would suggest you get a help for the mounting part.
customer_reviews.author: dostoevsky

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand with quick assembly but minor caveats.
customer_reviews.text: You can have this put together in about 45 minutes to an hour (probably faster once you do a few). It feels very sturdy with the small exception of the plate thing you can attach to hold your laptop or other TV-connected device. I wish it was easier to adjust the TV. The only real adjustments you can make are height and inclination. Doing either requires unscrewing stuff or leaving them loose enough to be in a slightly precarious position. For the value it's definitely great for having in open office environments for meetings, metric displays, or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: dngn0

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m really blown away at how well made this stand is. The directions were very clear, detailed, and written in English. All of the hardware was individually wrapped, to include all applicable Allen keys, screw driver and even mount bolts for the TV (with plastic spacers). This setup is for a classroom and is very easy to roll around. The wheels appear to be of a hard plastic on ball bearing casters. The frame is a matte black finish with cable management holes for HDMI/Power Cords. The TV mount allows you to tilt the TV up and down along with slotted holes to mount the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding material and design.  Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour and a half to put the cart together. Instructions were as clear as any unassembled piece of furniture I've assembled in the past. Did not follow the instructions in the order given since I installed the tray before I mounted the 55" TV. In this way I was able to completely finish the assembly before getting help lifting the TV from it's stand and mounting it to the cart. Additionally - there were 2 legs with wiring ducts instead of the one mentioned in the instructions. They both work well for running the power cords and the coaxial cable from the wall to the equipment. Outstanding material and design. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: quick fox

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This stand works great for my 49". Plus I have to pay my thanks and appreciation to this company, I recently moved and my movers helped me tear down alot of stuff, which I was happy about, but in the process, the bolts to attach my TV to the stand were lost. I emailed Vito and they worked with me to figure out what I needed and sent me the bolts free of charge, and these are bolts, so they cost to ship. Not to many companies do things like this anymore. So buy this stand, works great if you have a high bed or need your television levitated higher.
customer_reviews.author: Teryl L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: A lot of assembly required. Have power tools available
customer_reviews.text: It took us an hour and a half to assemble with two men assembling it. Some of the parts are heavy, and it didn’t come with proper screws to mount my particular tv. I bought an Amazon warehouse deal and the poles that hold up the tv were dented where it screws together because of this we needed to hammer it to be undented. I only paid 70 for mine because it was a return, but if I had no other choice I would pay full price because it is worth it. If you tuck it at the end of your bed it saves so much space
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Well, Color me impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am completely impressed with this stand. Good quality throughout. All the hardware was included. It appears to have been upgraded to address some of the issues mentioned by other reviewers. It went together easily in about 15 minutes. I used my own tools, as the provided tools aren't anything special. The TV is held securely in place. Seems to be very stable. Easy to move around with no worries about tipping over, or collapsing. I wish everything I purchased from Amazon was this high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all That!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It's built like a truck, big and heavy duty and still looks great! I was going for a tech minimal look and feel I achieved it. It hides all wires, and made my TV the focus of the room. I'm so glad I opted for this instead of the everyday TV console that ever quite matches all the other wood furnishings. This thing is a statement in the room without needing to match anything! I would recommend this to everyone as a more modern clean tech look that is fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Steveo

customer_reviews.title: First ever TV cart: very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be able to move an older (heavy) 46" TV around the house as needed. I've never owned a TV cart so wasn't entirely sure what to expect, but I'm very happy with how stable this cart is. I was able to assemble and mount the TV myself quite easily, and can roll it around over carpet and wood with little effort. It's nice that the legs don't stick out too far, so I can also push it against a wall and not feel like the legs are a tripping hazard, while it's still extremely stable. The hollow tubes for cable management are a nice feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, easy to assemble, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive quickly. Packaging was excellent! Each component was individually wrapped in plastic and enclosed in cardboard, no worries here about damage during shipping. The cart was easy to assemble, probably took 30 minutes. I am using the cart for watching TV on my patio, I didn't want to buy and outdoor TV to mount permanently, so this cart works great to roll back inside when not in use! I am happy with the purchase so far. I can't comment on durability as I have only been using it for a week, I let you know after the football season if there are any issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: E. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand for a 58” TV and overall this product is good quality for a good price! When I was assembling my “tv cart” i found it easier to: skip step 5a and continue on to step 5b aside the fact the “square plate connectors” #10 aren’t connected to the poles - so you end up attaching the connectors to the square plate. Go onto step 6b - Afterward, attach the “square plate” to the “TV arm set” that’s attached to the TV. Lastly, attach the TV to the stand by sliding the “square plate connectors” to the “poles” similar to step 5a. Thank you for reading!
customer_reviews.author: Juliano Cordero

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical that this will hold my tv... as soon as I started assembling it, I saw how VERY STURDY and STRONG this is!!! One of the best purchases I've made. I have no worries or doubts about my TV falling. I love that we can have movie time anywhere in our house now! The laptop stand is also a very nice bonus when we want to hook up our laptop. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dailycatshow

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is life changing. Now the tv can be anywhere you want. Inside, outside, by the hot tub. No need for mounting it’s even better. Set up can be frustrating. Start when you have some time and give it a break if you start getting annoyed. It will go together. I think it took an hour and a half or so. Quite sturdy with a 50 inch tv on it and the tray is quite handy. Once you get it set up putting the tv on it is a breeze. You will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: SD Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's almost perfect, like 99% perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight but very sturdy feeling, rolls smoothly across my hardwood floors without shaking the tv, shelf is perfect for the ps4 to sit on with a controller. It's the perfect solution for a studio apartment and it holds curved tv's up at eye level or higher with looking like a wallflower. The only thing they forgot was to put holes near the bottom of the poles to run the cords through to the outlet, though there are holes between the tray and the tv so those cords are hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sloppy

customer_reviews.title: good looking, mobile, strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and strong and sturdy. GREAT for church, schools, any classroom or learning environment, lectures, parties and gatherings. GREAT product for the price. You can buy more expensive stands but they are bulky and not really any more sturdy than this one. Looks great....sleek. Bought 2 for our children's area in our church, but thinking of getting one for my home! Pleased and would recommend this over more expensive ones...again, thinking of getting another one for personal home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Conference Room w/ 55" TV
customer_reviews.text: Put a 55" TV on this for our conference room and it works great. Hid a small laptop between the mount and TV and now it's like having a 55" Desktop for use in trainings and meetings. Very professional and have received many inquiries and compliments. Wheels roll very nice, easy to move from office to office if needed. Cord control is excellent, added a black extension cord and powerstrip so no dangling cords. Assembly was easy with all tools provided. Only required help when hanging TV due to size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Although I got some painful superficial cuts during assembly, it was relatively easy to put together. Just be very careful when you attach the metal caps to the tube ends; they are a lot more sharp than they look. The actual product itself is amazing. Great cable management and surprisingly sturdy. I was able to setup a 32'' monitor with no problem. Wheels are great and lock solid into place. The white looks fantastic in person. Overall, very happy with my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Where Are My Droids?

customer_reviews.title: It’s flexible firm strong and I absolutely recommend it. Valve for your money.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to assemble I did it myself. Was just one mistake ,missing one screw. Had to call a friend He gave me screw from his tool box, my 55” Samsung tv is sitting very comfortable in the stand. I can move to any part of house. I bought it because my landlord don’t want her wall to be drill. Is is very good to have that . Can also turn in any direction you want it to put. I love it it more than happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great quality and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked extremely well! The sturdiness and ease to move it around was exactly what I was looking To present a video at a graduation ceremony we had for our daughter. The setup took about an hour using a power drill. The instructions were very easy and I was really really impressed how well it worked overall with a 55” tv that was about 30pounds. I never worried that it would tilt over. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Too May parts and awkward base
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the design of the base . The front is too long and it causes me to bump into the base all the time. The product was also difficult to assemble. I had to have someone to assemble it for me. I would not have been able to put this item together myself.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, very stable.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big decision, because if it wasn't great, I'd be reminded of it ever time I looked at it. Very pleased with this purchase - the assembly was not hard thanks to the instructions included in the box (plus they have online tutorials). My 42" monitor is amply supported by the base (the main reason I opted for this product was I liked that geometry). Casters are good quality. Shelf was a bit fussy to get together because of the tight tolerances, but not a problem. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CMcA

customer_reviews.title: I really love this stand
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stand. Go slow on the assembly and do it right. The product come with a variety of spacers and bolts to fit a variety of televisions. In the end, you will be left with extra parts but that's okay. Just use the screws/bolts/spacers that best fit your set. I use this on my 55 inch LG television which is quite heavy and this stand can take it without any problems. I also bought some velcro cord straps to attach a surge power strip and other cables from my gaming units. I love this stand and it gives me the freedom to move it from room to room without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mounting a TV to be used in various rooms
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, knocked it out in an hour. Holds my 55 inch TV with no problem, shelf is large enough to hold a cable box, or slim version of a console. The wheels are adjustable, as is the stand to make sure the TV is balanced. I use this set up to move the TV from my living room area to my dining room area in my open floor plan living room / kitchen. I honestly love it and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zenteno

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: So happy I went with this make and model. The packaging was excellent. All the nuts and bolts in separate sealed plastic pockets. The quality of the parts and the ease that they went together was almost a joy to work on. The instruction booklet wasn't the best I've seen but they have a video that gives you a better idea of the build process. One of the better purchases I've made in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: R. Prather

customer_reviews.title: Tried to hate it...
customer_reviews.text: I kept thinking something would happen and I would not be able to connect everything properly. Or I would have missing parts or screwed up instructions. None of those things occured. This is a great cart. I have a 42" 4K LCD TV with 2.1 sound bar, and 8 port network switch attached. I have a power strip that turns everything once the master switch (TV) is turned on. All hidden in the back. Love ir. I have the white model. I use it in front of my Concept2 rowing machine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great with our 50" TV's
customer_reviews.text: This rolling cart has worked well with our 50" TVs. We purchased two carts and use them regularly in adult classroom settings. Each cart rolls smoothly and has been well-balanced. No tipping scares in the 10 months we have owned them. The vertical support tubes are easily used for HDMI (and I assume, other) cable management. The shelf easily holds a DVD player or a full-size laptop. Would, and will, purchase again when we have the need. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: d50player

customer_reviews.title: TILT FUNCTION NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: SET UP WAS EASY, WORKED WELL FOR THE FIRST MONTH BUT SOMETHING IS WONKY WITH HOW THE MOUNT PIVOTS AND TILTS. I PHYSICALLY HAD TO REMOVE THE TV TO TILT IT DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baima

customer_reviews.title: It is just okay
customer_reviews.text: The reviews here are great, maybe I got a bad piece? The assembly was not as easy to follow as other products I have put together. The tilt moves back but does not move forward unless I take off the TV and then adjust the tilt so it can tilt forward. When assembling the shelf the holes to screw it down did not line up, I was only able to screw down the top left and bottom right, there is some wobble. For the price, I probably paid for what I got, but I cannot rate this stand high because of the tilt and shelf issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, just don't trust it if you need to move it around all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the connection between the two main rods. The threads cut for both the connector and tubes are horrendous, I only got half the threads in before they stopped. The process in cutting these are glaringly cheaply done and have no business mounting expensive electronics. After this product, I have become more motivated to take pictures of flaws of products as I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: VIVO TV Cart is a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our 43" curve screen TV in our bedroom. It is very sturdy, comes with 4 caster wheels and has convenient holes to route your cable through so they're not hanging all over the place. I'm not a rocket scientist and found the assembly instructions were fairly easy to read and understand. We're happy with our VIVO TV Cart and think it's a worthwhile product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: keith e.

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV stand that was easy to out together.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble. Instructions were good, but not perfect. Screws and parts were all separated into individual compartments in one large bag, so that was very helpful. My TV was on the small side of the range it supports, but I would feel safe putting a much larger, heavier TV on this stand. Does what it should. I would buy it again. I would recommend an electric drill or screwdriver, though. It makes assembly much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV cart. We use this in the local history center and wheel the TV around for various gatherings. We left the feet on the TV and easily pop it off the stand and set it down on a table or window sill now and then. The little shelf is perfect for holding the remote control out of the way or setting a laptop connected to the TV. Lightweight, sturdy, doesn't rattle. Pretty easy to put together. We're considering buying a second one, and we agreed we'd absolutely buy this same model again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Okay so it looks fantastic and it came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Okay so it looks fantastic and it came very quickly. I had to knock off a star because LEGIT this thing is a bear to put together. It took me about 3 hours and at one point i put one of bars in a little slightly wrong and had to take a hammer and screwdriver in order to get it out. So BE WARNED, to take things slow when putting together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my application. Wear work gloves or really protect your hand when assembling the main vertical supports. The the threads are very sharp, and cut into rawhide gloves. Wish there was option to buy more shelves to install. A two person job to put the tv into the exact location you want. I was able to load a 65” tv from bed to stand on my own by lowering the mount to be just under connection point when tv is standing. Leaned the brackets together and then slowly pulled stand back while pulling base of tv back toward stand.
customer_reviews.author: NJAsmodeus

customer_reviews.title: Ain’t it cool
customer_reviews.text: I have a large MB, with a 47in tv that I have been having trouble seeing of late. At first I planned on getting a larger tv. I decided to purchase this tv cart and I put it at the foot of my king adjustable bed. At first it took my husband a moment to adjust and now we luv it. Thinking about getting the one that is goes up and down with a push of the button.
customer_reviews.author: Scruples

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome TV stand. Very, Very impressed.. It may made/packaged in China, but very well designed. Good quality, very sturdy. Instructions are 10 steps better than the typical China type instructions.Now if you are buying this stand for trade show applications, I'm not sure how durable it would be after taking apart and reassembling several times. This product seems to be the type you'd assemble, and leave assembled. Casters seem nice and durable too. Only thing I could have asked to be changed is the holes to adjust the shelf. Would be nice if it went higher for standing height use. So as it is now im not going to use the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Divedog

customer_reviews.title: Could charge four times as much for this AWESOME product... and we'd still buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is a WONDERFULLY thought out and manufactured product. I was leary because the price was so affordable. I got this thing and was amazed at how well built it was. Easily could charge three or four times what they are. Used this as my platform for a video conferencing cart for a state university (no money) I teach at. Added (1) wide screen camera, (1) USB group/ conference microphone, (1) used Dell 390 I got for $50, (1) old 40" 1080 LCD screen, Linux and Openmeetings and we're looking like we know what we're doing. Thanks so much for a great product. You really helped us save a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Eighch Dot

customer_reviews.title: Portable TV mount...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product. I mounted my 55 inch LED TV to it with no issues and with the wheels, it rolls easy over normal carpet, to make it transportable to another room if needed. Only gripe, and its minor, is how the tv can seem to be easily moved on the mount (twisted). This can be easily avoided by tightening the screws to prevent any sliding up and down the pole style mount. I even added a set screw on each side once I found the height I desired.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Can't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be more pleased with this unit. Strong, sturdy, tiltable screen mount. I have a 65" on it for office work and it wheels about easily and the wheels lock. Very sturdy with very little flex. I think it can easily take a larger screen. The only way to improve is to give two or three shelves. Otherwise, perfect. Still merits 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Authentic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV Cart. Kept it outside for the last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy to assemble. Very very stable. Affordable and super fast shipping. Customer service from Vivo is A+++. They answered my emails and helped me right away. Although I have kept it outside in scorching Miami weather with hurricanes and constant rain, it has held up perfectly. It has already outlasted 2 Tvs.
customer_reviews.author: Onibas

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with it! It has a great sleek look - very sturdy. We are confident it will hold our 65" TV without fail. Maneuverability is great - it rolls nice and locks into place sound as well. The only suggestion I would present is the instructions could have been easier to follow - a lot of it we had to guess from looking at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for presentation monitor
customer_reviews.text: We used this to mount a TV that is used solely for presentation purposes. Assembly was easy and the product is made of quality materials. Adjustments are fairly easy with two people. It is nice that uprights are hollow and you can run cords through them to eliminate clutter. Only complaint is that the plastic front caps for the base can be kicked off easily. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: CasaDeTrevino

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit the flat screen TV it was bought for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a bedridden friend so she could watch TV from her hospital bed set up at home living room. Needed help assembling, when finally assembled the TV which was also purchased new, did not fit the TV. So by the time I discovered this, the time for return had past. Too bad , she could have used the money for other items she needs
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable shelf is truly not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV Stand in order to place the TV behind a dining table and have the ADJUSTABLE shelf allow the TV Box to be above the table top and therefore making the table fully functionally. Once unit was put together we realized the shelf is adjustable but only on the bottom portion of the supports, therefore, the ADJUSTABLE shelf literally lays on the table, making the stand useless to me. I would return but have to take it apart and box it and have thrown box away.
customer_reviews.author: nancy littler

customer_reviews.title: Wheels fell off.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels fell off after 3 months. The threads were stripped, rendering the cart useless. So now I have to buy another one - some other brand.
customer_reviews.author: David, Kansas City

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: well it works, but... the casters are small and nearly useless. the plastic end caps on the legs and tops fall out. I suppose if your plan is to very rarely move the screen setup then this might work for home or light office use. I would not reccomend for busy use where you need to move it around a lot. I would also only reccomend lighter LED screens, older heavier CFL based screens are going to be too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: steve o

customer_reviews.title: Great for presentations
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, fairly easy to assemble. We used it for classroom teaching at church for Sunday school. Along with remote receivers (Screen Beam) for PC's makes ideal to broadcast a movie or to share session notes from a laptop
customer_reviews.author: Nick Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a very sturdy tv cart for the only tv in my apartment. Considering that my apartment is an efficiency I do not have very much space and a tv cart seemed to the best way to keep the precious little room I have to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: justme624

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Clean look, works great
customer_reviews.text: not to hard to put together myself, quality materials, very sturdy, looks great in my apartment, functional. i do wish there was more cord room inside the poles because i'm using an extension cord and so the bulky part wont fit inside, but eventually i'll get a smaller extension cord. great product,
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: TV floor stand works well
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for wall mount, but this caught my eye. It is very solid for a 55" flat screen. In my opinion it is well engineered and remarkably stable. We really like it. It doesn't stand all that far from the wall compared to a wall mount which swivels 30 degrees or so. Be careful to get the fine threads started correctly, don't force! It took me several minutes to be sure the uprights were threaded well so it took no force to screw them together. You can hide all the wires and have them come out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ted L.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Moderately easy to put together. It took some time to do so. Very nice design and very sturdy. Unassuming and not bulky in my small apartment. I like that I can rotate it on its wheels so I can see the TV from any area in the living space. I'll watch TV while I'm cooking in the kitchen, sitting on the couch, etc.
customer_reviews.author: retdmd

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect solution for me
customer_reviews.text: I had an old, rickety stand that I didn't want to use for my new 49" screen. This is the perfect solution for me. I live in a small space, so I can use this unit to turn the screen around into the kitchen when I want to watch. It's very easy to put together and looks classy. The wheels have individual locks; you lock it into place and then small nubs hide the locking devices for a smooth look. Vivo is the best brand for these stands, and I am very glad I decided to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Levant

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and I trust it to hold an expensive 55in monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I installed it without the tray so I could place it above 3 PC monitors. This cart is very sturdy. I read a previous review of someone who said they cut their hands on the threads of a connecting piece for 2 sections of tubing and it almost turned me away... The solution is to thread the upper pipe after starting it on the lower one and then turn the upper pipe to fasten both. This will secure both the upper and lower and I got no cuts at all. It did not take long to put together. Also, there are a lot of extra parts for mounting a wide variety of monitors.
customer_reviews.author: HabaaZ DaMann

customer_reviews.title: Steal Alert!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. My son is a Youtube gamer and wanted to be able to move his 65" LG around at his discretion. It come promptly and the sturdiness had our mouths popped open. After a 25 minute assembly (TV mounted and all by my son alone), we exchanged the "dayyyyyyyum" faces because we were not just pleased with the ease of setting it up, or the durability but also it looks good. He has his TV mounted and all gaming gear attached. I haven't seen him in a couple days, just to get a drink or something to eat, so I'm guessing it worked out just fine. I would definitely repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Andriette

customer_reviews.title: Excellence at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to conduct a lot of video chats and virtual events for our business and have a 50 inch screen so that we can see it at a distance. We do move it to different locations so the mobility of the unit is important. Easy, to assemble, good looking and easy to move and adjust. Very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Acampoman

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get my TV off of my dresser since it was making the drawers hard to open. Went with this option and what a difference a TV stand makes!!! Putting it together takes a bit of paying attention and remembering. It’s more than likely a 2 person job. Lol. My mom and I had good laughs putting it together tho. #FamilyBonding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very grateful for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand for my TV. The design looks a little tippy, but no issues. The directions tell you to put the short legs in the front, seemed like a bad idea so I installed it backwards. Haven't had any issues. It's very easy to assemble, move around and install my TV on the stand. No stability issues at all. Very grateful for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: still*glowing

customer_reviews.title: A lot of parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this is a beautiful piece once I have the time to put it together . There are several pieces I didn’t consider when I purchased it so it will take some dedication . All the parts were very well or organized and protected .I wonder if there is YouTube video to help me figure this out
customer_reviews.author: Belle Bivins

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend to someone I hate— like ...
customer_reviews.text: An Allen wrench and 1/5th of the parts came defective. Great product, would recommend to someone I hate— like the incompetent person who worked the quality line
customer_reviews.author: Geoff The Hero

customer_reviews.title: Good product that is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just put together the cart by myself and it was easy. However, you would need 2 people to mount the TV on the plate. The product seems sturdy but I have yet to mount the TV on it. The reason I. Ought this cart was that we did not want a TV in each room but rather keep moving the same TV connected to Fire stick from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: RonAmaze

customer_reviews.title: Really dynamite TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product in all ways. Made of heavy gauge steel, well machined, it handled my 50" flat screen with no problem. A bit complicated assembly, but first rate instructions along with compartmentalized parts made it easy. All tools required but a Phillips screwdriver were included. Once assembled, the TV is easily adjusted. The stand even has a level built in to make sure the TV is level. The wheels rotate on ball bearings and easily roll over carpet. I would highly recommend this stand to anyone that needs a mobile stand. Based on the quality of the material, I'm going to buy VIVO equipment if offered for a product that I need.
customer_reviews.author: DonDoc

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Portable TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: The assembly went fine. All the parts were present and in good condition. I attached a 47" Samsung for temporary outdoor use for football games via HDMI wireless video transmitter / receiver. The assembled stand feels very sturdy but is still light enough that I can pick the whole unit up to carry up a few steps when necessary. The cable management isn't horrible. You do have to run cables up from halfway down the pole towards the top. I just dropped a string down the tube and pulled them up. My only gripe with this stand is the wheels. They could be a bit larger. Rolling on carpet drags a bit. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Smalltown

customer_reviews.title: VIVO is a terrific seller
customer_reviews.text: This stand is probably the same as offered by other sellers. It is a bit difficult to put together and two people make the job easier and safer. One of our tubes was cut wrong. The seller immediately sent the correct part and another, just to be sure. We are very happy with the stand, two months later. We were careful to follow all of the instructions, and take our time. There were extra bolts, nuts when we were finished, perhaps for a different-size tv. Good, sturdy product, great seller.
customer_reviews.author: wantstoknow.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. No need to spend more.
customer_reviews.text: Bought five in the Fall; just came back for 4 more! Same great experience as before: Worked great for 60-inch tv's we used at a conference. They held large tv's with no problem. Rolled nicely. We left off the middle shelf (didn't need it). Vertical tube even has holes to pass cables thru. Assembly took a good while (45 mins+), but we built a few so they got easier. Just as well made as anything that's selling for two or three times as much. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy 123

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how well this was going to support an older 50" TV that we are planning on putting in our daughters room. I pulled out the instruction manual and got to work. This stand is easy to assemble and to my surprise it is very heavy and sturdy. We mounted the TV to the stand and it works perfectly. I do not have to worry about this tipping over in my daughters room and it has great locking casters on it. If you are looking for an economical TV stand that can be moved around then this is the perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: James Burrill

customer_reviews.title: The tilt is easy to use and reasonably accessible
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this because of the positive reviews, although I couldn't really see it being able to support my 65" monster. Not only did the product blow me away with it's quality, but it's really convenient too. The tilt is easy to use and reasonably accessible, the mount doesn't obstruct the cabling like some other models, and the shelf is sturdy enough to support a smaller 32" tv underneath the big one. 10/10 I would buy this again. Money very well spent.
customer_reviews.author: CJGradStudent

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this is the most brilliantly made device I have seen on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the first TV Cart I have bought and I got it for a 43 inch TV. I have to say this is the most brilliantly made device I have seen on Amazon!!! Putting this together was like clockwork. Perfectly packaged, and everything very well thought out. Getting cords out of view was very intuitive and easy to do. The adjustments on the frame to set the tv straight was just pure brilliance. This is one of those rare purchases that in my books earns 6 stars!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my “she-deck” and pool patio. I can just wheel my tv around with ease and not worry about it falling over. It’s very sturdy but takes some time to put together. I love that the wheels lock so I don’t have to worry about it tumbling down the stairs or rolling away. It is a little cumbersome to get in and out of the house because of the wideness of the front legs but I have it figured out now. This has made my TV watching experience much more enjoyable outside.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Buss

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, aircraft aluminum
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my office. I needed to be able to move a large screen TV around for presentations and other purposes. I was impressed by the construction of the unit. It is sturdy, aircraft aluminum. Very durable. Construction was a bit difficult and I had to really work the bolts and screws in a couple of locations in order to seat them properly, but once they were seated the unit was extremely solid and reliable. I love the laptop table in front. This will go a long way to make presentations in my office easier and more manageable. Overall, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Grieb

customer_reviews.title: Moving tv stand, strong and stable
customer_reviews.text: Av had this for 3years now and all my TVs fit 40", 50" etc. Love it cos it steady and you can tilt the tv upwards or downward say if it to high. I jus feel lazy hiding the cables through the 2 pole stand. I dont need to mounting on the wall and still keep my speakers, DVD player and roku all on the shelve under.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy. I only have a Visio 40" on it
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy. I only have a Visio 40" on it, but it is obvious it could handle a lot more size/weight. Cable chases can be a little tricky... coming in from the top of the stand tube to/from monitor; especially if you don't have it set to a height at the top portion of the available range. Takes a solid hour to assemble and most tools (minus a Phillip's head screwdriver) are included. Very good value for the $, would recommend and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Friedmanagain

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i needed something to sit my TV high so i could use the peloton app while i workout at home. And also roll into the basement for when my sons friends want to play video games and need an extra TV. It was really easy to put together, very sturdy and looks great! Awesome price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: boricuagoddess79

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these carts. We now have 4 of them in our office. Not a complain, but as a suggestion, if the wheels were bigger, I would like them more. Regardless, they are a great value and work as advertised. Took a little thinking as the directions are not perfect, but if you plan it out and carefully look at the parts, you'll do just fine putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Freaking Pepperoni

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't put this together the maintenance man in my building did. He took about 1.5 hours. I love it. Instead of having the TV mounted on my wall, I have the luxury of moving this to wherever I am comfortable while watching TV. It is clean, neat and modern looking,. Extremely sturdy. This really is a top quality stand.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy pal.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: Always been skeptical about purchasing these but let me tell yall something, this stand is probably the best i ever had. Its very sturdy, adjustable, and mobile. Instructions may look confusing at first but keep in mind that they send extra parts just incase you lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Abian

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart, works well
customer_reviews.text: Took me about forty-five minutes for me to put together and mount the TV by myself. I didn't have any issues understanding the instructions. TV is 55". Quality of the parts seemed good. No mis-drilled holes or stripped connectors. All the parts were included. Doesn't roll that great on my carpet (and I don't expect it to), but it does roll and it's very stable. The casters seem to be good quality as well. The attached tray is more than large enough to comfortably fit a Tivo system.
customer_reviews.author: J_R_2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave the maneuvering 4* is because it is solid and sturdy. Makes it a bit tough to lift up/down steps. We use it outside on our deck and lift it down to the garage or up into the house. It’s awesome. If someone steals it, I’m buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one so bought a second
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Feels very durable and has connectors for most if not all TV's. Only issue is that if you have a right angle connector on the power supply, hard or impossible to get past the center connector in the tube. Have 43" tv's attached and it works well. Shelf works well for dvd players and gaming consoles. Gives us the option to move it all around the house and on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: R. LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: So many options!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart to be able to take my TV outside when I wanted, the access of rolling makes it so convenient to place my TV anywhere in my house! I have polished concrete floors, so this moves very easy all over my home. From bedroom to office to outside! I wanted it to look more like furniture, less office cart. I added a shelf on the bottom legs, placed a basket and then another basket on the shelf with lid to hide remote storage. I stream wifi on this TV, so no box needed! Paid $10 extra for white cart, but goes perfect! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend as an alternative to wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Hefty and durable materials. I have no worries having my 65" TCL TV mounted on this. I removed the back two legs so I can push the cart closer to the wall and I still feel confident in stability. I definitely recommend as an alternative to a wall mount. The only issue I had was a fitment of the *male to male pole connector*... not sure what that is actually called. But the threads were not as smooth as the identical part for the opposite pole.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I may never go back to a TV stand again in any room after seeing how well this works. At 6' tall, this is the perfect height to see over my treadmill or Peloton, without having to look down. This saves my neck so much strain and keeps my posture much more aligned. It took about an hour to put together and some patience as the directions aren't perfect, but it worked. It is a very sturdy stand. The easiest part was the part I was most worried about, actually mounting the TV. That took about 10 seconds. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble. I use this rolling stand for a 5o inch older heaver TV and it works great. The stand easily rolls and is very stable. Locking wheels hold the stand in place when not being moved. The stand simple and well built. It took about 20 minutes to assemble and comes with everything needed to assemble and install your TV. The angle of the TV is easy to adjust (tilting) but the height is not a quick or easy adjustment....but not an issue
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quite a bit of assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, quite a bit of assembly required, takes atleast one hour, parts not labeled at all, have to go by pictures only. Since there are different size bolts etc.. for different sized TVs etc.. at first the amount of screws and bolts is shocking, but most of them are not used. Not easy to assemble, but not terrible either. I did install the small shelf incorrectly, had to take out the screws and re-attach, but figured it out. Overall pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I have had this stand for two years. It was easy to assemble (Not sure why people are complaining), and it is very sturdy. The thing I like the most is that I have had to move the TV around a few times and this makes it so easy. I highly recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lhernana2j

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So sturdy and excellent quality. Assembly was fairly easy, the parts weren’t labeled on the bag but the pictures of each item was a big help. I’m a 50 something female and my husband carried it upstairs and I assembled it by myself ( the Yankees were on enough said lol)
customer_reviews.author: susan8047

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: One of the feet would not attach due to one of the brackets not being tapped from the factory. I searched for a phone number for the company in the included manual thinking they would just mail a replacement part but there was only an email address so I didn't bother. I went to the hardware store to purchase bolts, lock nuts, and washers to put this together rather than waiting on an email. Overall it seems stable with a 50" LG HDTV mounted 2/3 of the way up but its not great.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: Had I reviewed this thing in the first three months - 5 stars, now 3. wheels fall out despite being FIRMLY in place after assembly. paint thin and easily nicked. Sadly, it isn't holding up well and feels shaky when moved or view angle is adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Very good stand
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with stand. It is heavy duty and very stable, which is what I was looking for. Using it with a 50 inch tv and it works very well. The only 2 downsides are that the instructions could be a little more detailed and it would be nice if the tray could be mounted higher on the stand. Neither one of these are a deal breakers. I would buy the tv stand again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

product_meta.title: VIVO Mobile TV Cart for 32-65 inch LCD LED Plasma Flat Panel Screen TVs up to 110 lbs, Pro Height Adjustable Rolling Black Stand with Laptop Shelf & Locking Wheels - Max VESA 600x400 (STAND-TV03E)
feature_bullets: FITS 32" TO 65" TV's - Compatible with LCD LED flat screens weighing up to 110 lbs with VESA patterns of 200x200mm to 600x400mm. The maximum screen height for this stand is 57.5".
MIDDLE STORAGE SHELF - Sturdy and adjustable with a 10 pound weight capacity. Holds laptops, DVD players, streaming devices, and other equipment.
INTEGRATED CABLE MANAGEMENT - Provides clean internal organization for power and AV cords, keeping potentially messy cables safely out of the way.

ADJUSTABLE CART - Features +15° to -15° of screen tilt for better viewing angles and 4 locking casters to make the cart stationary or mobile when desired. The wheels provide smooth mobility on both hardwood and carpet floors.
WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED - Sturdy steel design is backed with a 3 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,161 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
